mapper.select: select count(*) from news where partid=#{partId}
select * from (select rownum rn,a.* from (select * from news where partid = #{2} and flag='Y' order by weight desc,ndate desc) a where #{0} * #{1} >= rownum) where rn> + (#{0} - 1)* #{1}
select nid,nitid,partid,title,to_char(ndate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ndate,weight,content,picpath,vediopath,voicepath,views,author,news_file,status from news where nid=#{nid} and status='Y'
